attributes.action: Sack all cabinet ministers that have abused expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all Cabinet Ministers that have abused the expense claim system for their own gain to be sacked. Peter Mandelson- claiming for a house refurb after announcing his departure as an MP, Hazel ten homes Blears, Jacqui (hubbie loves a bit of porn) Smith, Alastair four homes Darling would all be a good start.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
